pageContext.claim: “I got 74 million, 74 million is 11 million more than I got last time. It's millions more than Ronald Reagan got when he won all, uh --  He won 49 states, I guess? He won 49 states, yes. And it's, uh, it's millions more.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a dumb comparison. The U.S. population is now almost 40 percent larger than in 1984, when Reagan defeated Walter Mondale. The voter turnout was also higher in 2020 than in 1984.
